title: Purrfect Puzzle
description: Purrfect Puzzle is an adorable cat-themed tile-merging puzzle game where players strategically place and combine cat tiles with different values to achieve higher scores. With relaxing pastel visuals, the game challenges players to think ahead while enjoying a cozy, heartwarming experience. Perfect for puzzle lovers and cat enthusiasts alike!
instructions: Put the cat-themed tiles on the board. Three of the same tiles will create a tile of higher value. You can also use the Heart and remove some tiles if you get stuck!

title: Flight Sim Air Traffic control
description: Flight Sim is a game where you have to guide aircraft to their landing zones, keep the skies safe to complete the levels to get high score.
instructions: How To Play: Guide planes and helicopters in to runway by drawing the paths Don’t crash and complete the level to get high score

title: Woody Tap Block
description: Woody Tap Block is an addictive puzzle game where you have to use logical thinking to move and remove wooden blocks in the right direction. With simple yet challenging mechanics, the game offers a relaxing yet engaging experience. Plan your moves in the correct order to clear all the blocks. As you progress through levels, the puzzles become more challenging with new obstacles and block types to overcome.
instructions: Tap on the wooden blocks to remove them from the board — but only if they're not blocked by other pieces. Each block can move only in the direction shown by its arrow, so think carefully before tapping! The higher the level, the more difficult the challenge with different types of obstacles.

title: Wood Block Jam
description: Wood Block Jam is a vibrant, addictive puzzle game where you slide colored blocks to matching doors. Swipe and slide through hundreds of creatively designed levels, featuring arrow blocks, layer blocks, freeze blocks, lock blocks, and more. Plan your moves to overcome barriers and clear each board using the fewest moves. With intuitive controls, smooth animations, and mind-bending challenges from easy to extreme, Wood Block Jam delivers endless brain-teasing fun!
instructions: ✅ Swipe & Slide – Move blocks in any direction. ? Match Colors – Guide each block to its matching exit. ? Avoid Obstacles – Navigate barriers and tricky layouts. ? Plan Your Moves – Think ahead to clear the board efficiently.

title: Idle Market Tycoon
description: Grow your idle market, hire managers, and earn money even offline! Idle Market Tycoon is a fun and addictive idle simulation game where you build and manage your own shopping empire. Start with a small stall, grow your business, hire smart managers, and upgrade every department to attract more customers and earn profits – even while you're offline! ? From fruit stands to electronic stores, expand your marketplace step by step and become the ultimate market tycoon.
instructions: Drag to move

title: Metro Escape
description: On Metro escape you must search the room for items that will help you escape. Search for itens in the metro and use them to solve the puzzles. Look carefully at the various patterns around the metro and solve the riddles. Good luck to search for your way to escape!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the objects.

title: Ragdoll Bob Puzzle
description: Help Bob reach his goal in Ragdoll Bob Puzzle, a quirky and fun 2D puzzle game that challenges your brain and creativity! Bob is a floppy ragdoll who needs your help to get to the endpoint while collecting as many stars as possible along the way. But here’s the twist—you can’t control Bob directly. Instead, you must guide his path by placing a limited number of blocks and objects in the right spots to create a safe and clever route.
instructions: Guide Ragdoll Bob to the endpoint by placing objects and solving clever physics puzzles!

title: Match 3D Puzzle Saga
description: Ready to match and collect? Solve puzzles to earn coins, unlock powerful power-ups and complete daily challenges to grab extra rewards and sweet bonuses. The more you play, the more opportunities you have to boost your score!
instructions: The game offers endless levels. Match objects to complete levels and move forward. Each level presents three difficulty options and four special abilities to help you tackle challenges. Daily quests and rotating events provide extra chances to earn rewards.

title: Sticker Puzzle Book
description: Step into the captivating world of Sticker Puzzle, where creativity and strategy come together in a beautifully immersive experience. Explore a vibrant sticker book filled with artistic challenges, visual storytelling, and mind-bending puzzles. Designed as a peaceful chromatic retreat, Sticker Puzzle blends the calming satisfaction of sticker art with the engaging thrill of strategic problem-solving — the perfect harmony of relaxation and mental stimulation.
instructions: Drag and Drop Stickers Match and place stickers onto the correct outlines in the scene. Use your creativity and keen eye to find where each sticker belongs. Solve with Strategy Some stickers may look similar or fit in multiple places — think carefully and solve each puzzle step by step. Unlock New Chapters Completing puzzles unlocks new pages filled with fresh challenges and stories. Collect and Customize Earn rewards and unlock special stickers to personalize your sticker book.

title: Purrfect Puzzle
description: Purrfect Puzzle is an adorable cat-themed tile-merging puzzle game where players strategically place and combine cat tiles with different values to achieve higher scores. With relaxing pastel visuals, the game challenges players to think ahead while enjoying a cozy, heartwarming experience. Perfect for puzzle lovers and cat enthusiasts alike!
instructions: Follow on screen instructions.

title: Buckshot Roulette
description: Do you dare to bet your life on an exciting roulette wheel showdown? Buckshot Roulette is a gun simulator that combines strategy, shooting and survival. Instead of a pistol, a powerful shotgun was used. Every pull of the trigger is a choice of fate. The winner lives, the loser dies. You will begin a Turn-Based shooting roulette game. Each round will have a fixed number of bullets and blanks.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Brick Match
description: Brick Match is a fast, fun puzzle game! Tap to match colorful bricks, trigger combos, and beat brain-teasing levels. Use boosters like the Shuffle, Colour Bomb, Extra Moves, and Row Blaster to blast through tough spots. Can you clear the board and beat your high score?
instructions: Here’s the revised version without emojis: • Tap groups of 2 or more same-colored bricks to clear them. • Complete the level goals before you run out of moves! • Use boosters like Colour Bomb, Row Blaster, Shuffle, and Extra Moves to help. • Bigger matches mean bigger combos and higher scores!

title: One Line
description: One Line is a casual art drawing game where your mission is to use a single line to protect an innocent man from a series of unfortunate events. From shielding him against heavy rain to fending off aggressive bees and even angry giants, each level presents a new challenge. Get creative and use the power of One Line to ensure he stays safe, all while enjoying the simple yet satisfying drawing mechanics. The more you play, the more you'll need to think outside the box to keep him protected!
instructions: How to Play One Line In One Line, your mission is to protect an oblivious man from a variety of threats by drawing a single line. From falling boulders to aggressive bees and even bullets, dangers are constantly looming. The puzzles start simple, but as you progress, the challenges become more complex with new elements to consider. Your line can block, divert, or shield the man, but it’s up to your creativity to figure out the best way to keep him safe.

title: 2048 Merge Circle
description: 2048 Merge Circle is a fun and addictive number puzzle game with a twist! Rotate the circle, aim carefully, and shoot numbered balls to merge them. Combine matching numbers to upgrade them until you reach the ultimate goal—2048! It's a fresh take on the classic 2048 game with smooth mechanics and satisfying merges. Great for fans of casual games, brain teasers, and relaxing challenges.
instructions: How to Play Tap to shoot a ball into the rotating circle. Balls with the same number will merge and create a higher number (e.g., 2 + 2 = 4). Aim wisely to avoid filling the circle too much. Keep merging until you reach 2048 – or go beyond to challenge your high score! The game ends if the circle gets too full and there's no space to shoot

title: Room Sort Floor Plan
description: Room Sort Floor Plan is a fun creative puzzle game with elements of sorting and design. In this casual game, you’ll go through proper sorting and organization. Designing the perfect layout for every room. Rearrange the floor plan to create your unique home. Each level is a jigsaw puzzle challenge.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Alien Intelligence Test
description: You've been abducted. To prove you're intelligent, aliens test you with strange puzzles and machines. Push buttons, solve challenges, survive the test.
instructions: Use only your mouse or touchpad. Click buttons, levers, and switches to discover logic patterns and complete each level.

title: Sudoku Guru - classic sudoku
description: Develop your logic and train your brain in "Sudoku Guru - Classic Sudoku"! Enjoy Sudoku, solve daily challenges and get trophies for completing tasks. There are 5 different difficulty levels available to you: easy, medium, difficult, expert and guru. Each level is a unique puzzle. Track your progress and challenge yourself with the statistics report. This feature adds a competitive element to the game, motivating you to become a real guru.
instructions: The goal of Sudoku is to fill the 9x9 playing field (each row, column and 3x3 block) with numbers from 1 to 9. The basic rules of Sudoku are: - vertical numbers should not be repeated; - numbers should not be duplicated horizontally; - a number can appear in a 3x3 square only once.

title: The White Room 5
description: The White Room 5 is the fifth sequel of an adventure escape game with a cartoon art style. Find objects that can help you escape the room and use your logic to solve the puzzles. Good luck!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the objects.

title: Single Line Puzzle Drawing
description: Sharpen your mind each day with fun single-line drawing puzzles — clever, captivating brain teasers that boost your cognitive skills one stroke at a time. Enjoy a relaxing and rewarding 20-minute mental workout! Would you like a version tailored for an app store description or marketing banner?
instructions: Start Drawing: Tap and drag to draw a line. One Stroke Only: Complete the entire shape without lifting your finger or retracing any line. Think Ahead: Plan your path carefully — every line counts! Complete the Puzzle: Finish the shape in one smooth motion to solve it. Progress & Challenge: Each level gets trickier — test your logic and pattern skills as you go!

title: Help The Duck
description: Helping Little Duck In this Skill Game help a charming little duckling to fall into the tub with water. Throw the water in the correct places so that the duckling falls directly into the tub. - Play Helping Little Duck Free and Enjoy!
instructions: Use your mouse to push the duck

title: Nonogram Master
description: Nonogram Master is an exciting puzzle game based on Japanese crosswords. Solve hidden pixel pictures using numbers as clues! Choose a comfortable control method: PC — Left-click to fill a square, right-click to mark with an "X". Mobile — Tap control: select a mode and tap a cell. Customize the game, train your logic, and enjoy the process! Are you ready to become a Nonogram Master?
instructions: How to Solve Nonograms: 1. Read the Clues Numbers next to rows and columns tell you how many squares to fill. Multiple numbers mean separate groups, with at least one empty square between them. 2. Start Simple Fill rows or columns where the numbers add up to the total length. Mark empty squares with an "X" if you're sure they're not filled. 3. Watch the Picture AppearKeep going step by step. There's only one solution, so take your time and enjoy!

title: The White Room 4
description: The White Room 4 is an immersive escape game that challenges your logic and problem-solving skills. Find yourself trapped in a hotel room and embark on a thrilling adventure to escape. Utilize the tools at your disposal, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and crack passwords to unlock your path to freedom. Will you be able to conquer the puzzles and break free from this challenging escape experience?
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the objects.

title: Number Master
description: A number elimination game, connect two numbers that are the same or add up to 10, eliminate them!Relax and match in a peaceful bamboo forest. If you enjoy logic puzzles like Sudoku, Merge Numbers, Ten Match, or CrossMath, Panda Match Ten is your perfect nature escape. Train your brain, improve your memory, and boost logic—all with the charm of adorable pandas and soothing bamboo forests.
instructions: A brain-challenging yet calming number puzzle wrapped in the charm of pandas and green bamboo. Discover a delightful new take on number puzzles with Panda Match Ten! Perfect for fans of Sudoku, Number Match, Ten Crush, Make Ten, and other number-based games, this experience lets you sharpen your mind while immersing yourself in a serene bamboo world. Connect numbers that are identical or add up to 10 to clear the grid and help your panda progress through tranquil levels.

title: Rope Color Sort 3D
description: Rope Color Sort 3D is a creative puzzle game where players need to skillfully sort colorful ropes into their corresponding tubes. The game features beautiful 3D graphics and smooth physics effects, providing players with a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience.
instructions: Using mouse to move the ropes

title: Fun IQ Puzzle
description: Fun IQ Puzzle is a vibrant and engaging logic game that test your problem-solving skills with colorful bubble-based puzzles. In Story Mode, we have to unlock locked spaces by placing colorful puzzles in the right spots. In Time Attack Mode, we have to race against the clock to solve puzzles as quick as possible. Challenge yourself to master every stage with this fun puzzle game!
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Candy Smash
description: Candy Smash is a lively and addictive puzzle game where players tap on clusters of sweet candies to clear them and rack up points. Plan your moves wisely to clear the board and set new high scores before your lives run out! Featuring bright, colorful graphics and a delightful candy-themed world, this match-and-clear adventure is perfect for players of all ages.
instructions: Tap on the same colored clusters of candies to remove them.

title: Parking Frenzy
description: Welcome to Parking Frenzy, the ultimate test of precision, planning, and timing! Forget everything you know about driving simulators—this game doesn’t need pedals, steering wheels, or complicated controls. Just swipe your finger, draw the perfect path, and let your car glide into the parking spot. With a stylish 3D look, dynamic environments, and intuitive gameplay, Parking Frenzy delivers a uniquely satisfying experience that’s easy to play and hard to master.
instructions: mouse only

title: Rootlings: Secrets of the Depths
description: Dive into Rootlings: Secrets of the Depths, an innovative turn-based game where you guide a root deep into the mysterious underworld. Collect water to survive, avoid hazards, and uncover surprises across exciting levels. Choose from Levels mode for challenges or Endless mode to climb the global leaderboard. Customize your root with stylish hats and enjoy minimalistic graphics and relaxing sounds in this unique underground adventure!
instructions: Controls on Mobile: Tap the plus signs to move left or right. Controls on PC: Use the F and V keys to move left or right. You can also use the arrow keys on your keyboard!

title: Nuts Bolts Screw Glass
description: "Nuts & Bolts: Screw Glass" is a creative puzzle game. In this meticulously designed mechanical world, you need to match different screws to their corresponding colored boxes. Every move requires careful consideration, as unmatched screws will fall into the groove at the bottom — once the groove is filled, the game is over.
instructions: Simple and intuitive controls: Just use your left mouse button to perform all game actions!

title: Block Puzzle Tropical Story
description: Discover a new genre in the world of puzzles! This game intertwines block puzzles with a thrilling adventure on tropical islands! Complete levels to earn stars, unlock new territories and unique relaxation areas. From snow-white beaches to dense jungles – each location is filled with unique challenges. The booster system will help you in difficult situations, and the well-thought-out mechanics allow both beginners and experienced players to enjoy the game.
instructions: A relaxing puzzle game where you connect blocks while traveling through picturesque tropical islands. Collect stars, unlock new locations and immerse yourself in the resort atmosphere!

title: Master Blender
description: Becoming the Strongest Bartending Master！Tap the bottle lightly to pour water. Organize the water so that each bottle's water is distributed to the corresponding colored cup!
instructions: In the game, by clicking on the colored cup, unlock the same color of the glass to complete the level.

title: Find The Cat - Cat Search
description: Discover the exciting world of finding hidden cats in this original puzzle game! Look for cats on black and white backgrounds by tapping on them to complete levels. With each stage, you will unlock new places and receive unique challenges that will test your attentiveness and observation skills.
instructions: The goal of the game is to find hidden cats on black and white backgrounds by clicking on them to complete levels. The game trains attentiveness, observation skills and brings pleasure from searching for cats in unexpected places. - To select a cat - click on it (LMB on desktop). - To move around the map - hold on it and move (hold LMB on desktop). - To change the scale - pinch or spread your fingers (mouse wheel on desktop).

title: Red Escape
description: In Red Escape you must search for useful items in the series of rooms to help you escape. Look carefully around the rooms, and use your logic to solve the riddles. Find your way to escape!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the objects.

title: Girl Rescue - Dragon Out
description: Are you ready to start the rescue operation? Welcome to Girl Rescue: Dragon Out!, a brain-challenging puzzle game that combines leisure and challenge! You need to have good strategies to stop the invasion of the dragon and protect our girls!
instructions: Your goal in Girl Rescue is to use cannons to stop the dragon invasion and keep our girls unharmed. It is very easy to play and will also test your reflexes and matching skills!

title: Snap Fix
description: Snap Fix is a fast-paced block puzzle game where you slide tiles to restore a scrambled picture. With one empty space to maneuver, you must think quickly and arrange the grid before time runs out! Complete the puzzle to unlock and download the image as a reward. Can you snap everything into place before the clock hits zero?
instructions: Use mouse to click on puzzle pieces to move it to empty block.

title: My Tiny Land
description: An ultra-quiet and super stress-relieving fruit and vegetable matching game with hundreds of types of fruits waiting for you to collect.
instructions: You can drag identical fruits into a basket, and eliminating them requires only a match of three. To win, you need to eliminate all the fruits and vegetables within the specified time limit. The game boasts simple controls and engaging game play.

title: Farm of Words
description: Welcome to the unusual farm. Each farm specializes in growing its agricultural products. Someone grows and sells livestock, while others-cereal, cereals or legumes, and others-breed gardens and grow fruits and so on, there can be many directions. Our farm is unusual, because in the square plots of the Earth you will grow words. Connect the letters on the round field below, they will unite into words that will grow after watering on land tiles in Farm of Words.
instructions: Use the mouse or tap the screen to connect the letters.

title: Hidden Objects: Vacation in Brazil
description: Discover Hidden Treasures in Brazil – Play "Hidden Objects: Vacation in Brazil"! Embark on a thrilling hidden object adventure through Brazil! Search and find hidden objects in stunning locations, enjoy fun mini-games, and collect unique souvenirs. Explore famous landmarks like SugarLoaf Mountain and the Amazon jungle. Visit ancient castles, vibrant museums, and mysterious caves. Experience the energy of Rio de Janeiro and unwind on Brazil’s beautiful beaches.
instructions: The lower part of the screen shows the items that need to be found on the level. Be careful and try to find them all!

title: Cozy Garden Idle
description: Unwind with this soothing and adorable place. Reveal, pick, and nurture attractive plants to extend your garden and provide more oxygen!
instructions: Reveal, pick, and nurture attractive plants to extend your garden and provide more oxygen.

title: Egg Adventure 2
description: Mr Egg comes back, and also a challenge of intelligence and imagination.In egg adventure 2,you need to operate the Eggs to solve various puzzles and get out of the door.Imaginative levels ann funny painting style will take you into a whole ner puzzle world!The key to solving the puzzle may be a word or an action, that can you give it a try？
instructions: manipulate eggs to solve all kinds of puzzles and get out of the door

title: Link Flow
description: Enter the mesmerizing world of Link Flow, where logic meets creativity in a captivating puzzle experience! In this minimalist yet visually stunning game, your goal is simple: connect the dots with seamless lines, recreating intricate patterns that test your problem-solving skills.
instructions: With each level, the complexity increases, requiring you to think ahead and strategize your moves. The clean interface, calming aesthetics, and smooth mechanics make Link Flow both relaxing and challenging at the same time. Whether you're looking for a casual brain teaser or a deep puzzle-solving experience, this game offers endless entertainment. Challenge your mind, sharpen your logic, and enjoy the smooth, flowing gameplay of Link Flow!

title: Kingdom Puzzles
description: Kingdom Puzzle is a relaxing brain game where you see a grid with different colored regions. Your goal is to place one king in each region while following the rules. Each region can have only one king, and kings cannot be in the same row or column. They also cannot be next to each other, meaning the nearest tiles must be empty. To win the level, you must place all kings correctly. Placing a king in the wrong spot reduces your points.
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Color Block Jam
description: Color Block Jam – A Satisfying Block Puzzle Challenge! ? Get ready for a fun and brain-teasing puzzle experience! Move the colorful blocks around the board and match them correctly to clear the space. Think ahead, plan your moves, and solve tricky levels! Can you master the ultimate color sorting challenge?
instructions: Drag & drop blocks to rearrange them

title: Capybara Screw Jam
description: Welcome to Capybara Screw Jam! This is a cute and brain-teasing puzzle game. You’ll join a lovable capybara on a journey of problem-solving and strategy. With simple gameplay and increasing challenges, it’s the perfect game for anyone who loves casual puzzles and brain workouts. Your goal is to help the capybara solve various puzzle challenges. Each level presents various colors of capybara.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hexa Puzzle Master
description: Hexa Puzzle Master is a fun and addictive web puzzle game where players fit hexagonal blocks into a grid. With simple drag-and-drop controls, players must think strategically to complete levels without gaps. Featuring multiple difficulty levels and a sleek design, the game offers a relaxing yet challenging experience for puzzle lovers of all ages!
instructions: Drag & Drop – Click and drag hexagonal blocks to place them on the board. Fill the Grid – Arrange the pieces to fit perfectly without leaving gaps. No Rotation Needed – Blocks are pre-set in orientation, so focus on placement. No Time Limit – Relax and solve at your own pace and challenge yourself. Game Over – The game ends when there are no valid moves left.

title: Luna And The Magic Maze
description: Have you ever wished to master magic without any innate abilities? In this game, you'll lead Luna, a curious little creature with big dreams of becoming a wizard, through intricate and ever-challenging mazes. Set in an enchanting autumn forest, your goal is to gather magical artifacts, unlock gates, and navigate through teleportation portals to complete each level. The challenges will intensify, but so will the thrill. Can you help Luna prove that perseverance surpasses magic?
instructions: Control movement with WASD or arrow keys. Enjoy your adventure!

title: Crush the Eggs
description: In this game, eggs have appeared that you will have to fight with and break. In front of you on the screen you will see a platform on which the egg will be located. Above it you will see a special field. Using the mouse you can draw any object on it. When you finish your actions, this item will fall directly onto the egg. If your calculations are correct, then you will break it and thus destroy it. After this you will move to the next level of the game.
instructions: Use the mouse or tap the screen to draw an object to destroy the eggs.

title: Superwings ColorSwitch
description: Guide Mini Super Pet Golden Boy through space avoiding all the traps to move forward. Dodge circles, barriers, boxes, and all kinds of obstacles
instructions: Tap on the screen to speed up or stop Mini Golden Boy.

title: Power Light
description: Move the tiles around until the power can flow freely to the light bulb. Power up the light bulb to complete each level in this fun online puzzle game
instructions: Click or tap to rotate the tiles

title: Cyber Monday
description: Cyber Monday – Build, Push, and Solve Challenges! In Cyber Monday, your goal is to use blocks of different shapes and properties to reach a specific position. Push, drop, and stack the blocks strategically to build a stable bridge and complete each level! But be careful—once placed, the blocks cannot be removed. Plan your moves wisely to solve the puzzle!
instructions: 1️⃣ Push and drop blocks to form a bridge. 2️⃣ Plan each move carefully—blocks cannot be removed! 3️⃣ Reach the designated position to complete the level. 4️⃣ Solve increasingly challenging puzzles and test your problem-solving skills!
